title: How do you know when you've enlisted in Ocean Week?

embed.description: Yes. Two skins will go on sale at the beginning of every day of Ocean Week. There will be a 30% discount on the following skins, with their respective champions also going on sale for 50% off. Each sale lasts for 48 hours.

body:
On the link for ocean week I click on Enlist but nothing happens. Anyone know how you can tell when your enlisted?? 

Thanks!

replies.body:
Hey MF,

Once you've enlisted in Ocean Week 2016, the "Enlist Now!" button will be replaced with

> You have pledged for Ocean Week!

http://i.imgur.com/uNwhDWv.png
Thanks for the help :) But nothing happens when I click on 'Enlist now' when I'm logged into my account?
